article_title: Christensen: Outsider Ben Carson on the rise
article_text:
Ben Carson offers biography, outsider status and conservatism

Polls show him trailing only Donald Trump in North Carolina

His support among conservative evangelicals is hurting Huckabee and Cruz

article_metadata.title: Christensen: Outsider Ben Carson on the rise | News & Observer

og.description: For an hour last week, Dr. Ben Carson had the audience in Berean Baptist Church leaning forward in their pews to catch his soft-voiced message.
